channel.title: Oneida County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Oneida County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Last distance marker in Idaho on I-15 south. Distance to Tremonton, Brigham City, and Salt Lake. All destinations listed are in Utah.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 3
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 3 - Woodruff/Samaria. This is the last exit in Idaho on I-15 southbound.

item.title: I-15 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-15 south. Distance to Tremonton, Brigham City, and Salt Lake. All destinations listed are in Utah.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 13
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 13 - ID-38/Malad.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 13
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 13 - ID-38/Malad.

item.title: Deep Creek Road at I-15/ID-36 (Exit 17)
item.description: Deep Creek Road at I-15/ID-36 (Exit 17). Turn right for I-15 south to Salt Lake (Utah); continue over freeway for ID-36 East to Weston and for I-15 north to Pocatello.

item.title: ID-38 East at South Main St.
item.description: ID-38 East (90 S) at South Main St. in Malad City. Turn left on S Main St to continue east on ID-38 and for I-15 to Ogden (UT) and Pocatello.

item.title: ID-38 East at 1st West - Malad City
item.description: ID-38 East at 1st West in Malad City. Turn left for Hospital - continue straight for ID-38 and I-15.

item.title: ID-38 East at 5400 West to Pocatello Valley
item.description: ID-38 East at 5400 West to Pocatello Valley

item.title: ID-38 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-38 east. Distance to Pleasantview and Malad.

item.title: ID-38 East - Winter Maintenance
item.description: Winter maintenance hours on ID-38 between Holbrook and Malad City. Normal Snow Removal between hours of 6:00 AM and 6:00 PM.

item.title: ID-38 East - Holbrook
item.description: ID-38 east in Holbrook. This is the first ID-38 shield eastbound.

item.title: End ID-38 - Old Highway 37 Winter Maintenance
item.description: End ID-38 / Begin Old Highway 37. Road is maintained by Oneida County next 14 miles from 8:00 AM to 5:00PM.

item.title: End 21000 West at ID-38 and Old Highway 37
item.description: End 21000 West at ID-38 and Old Highway 37 in Holbrook. Turn left for Old Highway 37 (to ID-37) and American Falls. Turn right for ID-38 to Malad.

item.title: Entering Curlew National Grasslands on 23000 W
item.description: Entering Curlew National Grasslands on 23000 W near Stone, Idaho. Curlew is the only national grassland in Idaho and is administered by the Caribou-Targhee National Forest.

item.title: Entering Idaho on 23000 W
item.description: Idaho State Line on 23000 W (road connecting Snowville, Utah and Holbrook, Idaho).

item.title: I-84 East - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome to Utah on I-84 east at the Utah-Idaho state line.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 263
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 263 - Juniper Road.

item.title: I-84 West - First Distance Marker In Idaho
item.description: Distance marker on I-84 west. Distance to Burley and Twin Falls. This is the first distance marker along I-84 west in Idaho.

item.title: I-15 North - Malad Summit
item.description: I-15 north at Malad Summit - Elevation 5,574 Feet.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 22
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 22 - Devil Creek Reservoir.

item.title: End ID-36 West at I-15
item.description: End ID-36 west at I-15 north to Pocatello, and south to Malad and Salt Lake.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 17
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 17 - ID-36/Weston/Preston.

item.title: I-15 North Offramp at ID-38
item.description: I-15 north Exit 13 at ID-38 to Malad and Holbrook.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 13
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 13 - ID-38/Malad

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 3
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 3 - Woodruff/Samaria. This is the first Idaho exit on I-15 northbound.

item.title: I-15 North - Veterans Memorial Highway
item.description: I-15 - Veterans Memorial Highway - just north of Idaho/Utah border. I-15 has this sign at both the Utah and Montana state lines.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 263
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 263 - Juniper Road. This is the last exit in Idaho on I-84.

item.title: ID-38 Directional Marker - Malad
item.description: ID-38 to Pleasantville and Holbrook in Malad.

item.title: ID-38 West - Malad
item.description: Turn right for ID-38 in Malad.

item.title: Begin ID-38 in Holbrook
item.description: ID-38 to Malad and Oneida County Road to American Falls

item.title: End ID-38 at I-15
item.description: End ID-38 west at I-15 in Malad. Use I-15 south for Salt Lake; I-15 north for Downey and Pocatello.

item.title: End ID-38 at I-15 Exit 13
item.description: End ID-38 at I-15 (Exit 13) in Malad.

item.title: End ID-38 in Holbrook
item.description: Snow Indicating End of ID-38 and Beginning of Oneida County Maintenance

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 17 Offramp at ID-36
item.description: I-15 North - Exit 17 Offramp at ID-36. Use ID-36 east for Weston and Preston. Continue north on I-15 for Pocatello.

item.title: ID-38 East - To I-15
